expertise: You are an expert on organic synthesis.
initialization: Take your time to perform the task as truthfully as possible using the provided context. If any information is not provided or you are unsure, use 'N/A'.
objective: Create an action graph of the synhtesis procedure in the following sentence:

actions.Initialization: To create the action graph use only some the following actions, adding all the necessary information and repeating them if needed:
actions.Add: Add, mix or pour a new compound into a solution, indicate time, temperature and pressure of the addition if possible;
actions.Cool: Reducing the temperature of a mixture;
actions.Heat: Increasing the temperature of a mixture;
actions.Stir: Stirring or agitation operation, give information about time and temperature of the 'stir' operation;
actions.Concentrate: Evaporation of a substance to concentrate or semi concentrate;
actions.Extract: Extraction of a compound using a solvent;
actions.MakeSolution: Preparing a solution initially, indicate quantities of the solvent and compounds when possible;
actions.PhaseSeparation: Separation or fractionation between organic phase and aqueous phase layers;
actions.Partition: Addition of 2 immiscible solvents for a phase separation;
actions.Degas: Purge the mixture with a gas;
actions.Recrystallize: Recrystallize a solid from a solvent or a mixture of solvents

conclusion: Please do not mention actions that are not present in the sentence
